attributes.name: User Added as Owner for Azure Application v101.0.0
attributes.description: Identifies when a user is added as an owner for an Azure application. An adversary may add a user account as an owner for an Azure application in order to grant additional permissions and modify the application's configuration using another account.
author: Elastic
attributes.query: event.dataset:azure.auditlogs and azure.auditlogs.operation_name:"Add owner to application" and event.outcome:(Success or success)
attributes.setup: The Azure Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
